name: Full Combo
description: One mistake will end the game immediately, no questions asked

name: All Perfect
description: One early or late hit will end the game immediately

name: No-Fail
description: Basically makes you immortal for the entirety of the song

name: Hidden
description: Notes disappear before they reach you

name: Easy
description: Notes are more sightreadable and easier to hit

name: Hard
description: Notes are less sightreadable like that Geometry Dash meme...

name: Flashlight
description: I think this one is pretty self-explanatory
